long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ai Note Buddy is a workplace note-taking and knowledge management platform designed to integrate seamlessly with popular workplace tools like Slack and GitHub. It helps you capture, organize, find, and share the knowledge that matters most to you and your team.

With the Ai Note Buddy  Chrome extension, you can effortlessly capture useful knowledge from anywhere on the internet. Additionally, you can ask the AI assistant any questions or let it summarize web pages for you.
